column2:
Don't...
 - do anything by hand
 - (use GUIs, point&click, etc.)
 - clean data in Excel 


- don't save output (intermediary datasets)

- start with good science (question, material, etc.)
- teach a computer (tell your computer to do it)
- Use version control
- Keep track of your software environment
- Think about the entire pipeline
- Set the seed (reproducible random)

column1: Does reproducibility ensure correct data analysis?
column2: No, it doesn't tell about the correctness or validity of the analysis.
